General.Name: Ningbo Solartron Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningbo Solartron Technology Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells functional films in China and internationally. It offers reflective; backplane base; optical base; and other functional films, such as diffusion, brightness enhancement, temperature resistant self-release, and microfoam white film for use in liquid crystal display, semiconductor lighting, new energy, semiconductor flexible circuit board, and other fields. The company also provides li-ion battery separator. Ningbo Solartron Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

5.Name: Mr. Yinhong  Zhang
5.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Director
